EXTENSION.APPNAME_DESCRIPTION: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

EXTENSION.ENABLE_TOOLS: Enable the tools you want to use with Clockify extension

EXTENSION.HOSTED_ON_CUSTOM_DOMAIN: If you use a tool hosted on a custom domain, you can enable it here

EXTENSION.YOU_HAVE_NOT_TRACKED: It looks like you haven't tracked any time lately

EXTENSION.DETECT_IDLE_TIME: Detect idle time if inactive for

EXTENSION.CANNOT_END_ENTRY: Can't end entry without project, task, description or tags
